--0-1716563313-1075895888=:26149 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Hello everyone. Is there anyone out there who has the 3d Sudio to Radiance file converter program 'Conrad 1.2' ? Especially the password that unlocks the program as it is zip-protected? I downloaded the program some time ago and never checked the site for the password and now the site is no longer available. Many thanks if anyone can help. Yahoo! Hello everyone.
Is there anyone out there who has the 3d Sudio to Radiance file converter program 'Conrad 1.2' ? Especially the password that unlocks the program as it is zip-protected? I downloaded the program some time ago and never checked the site for the password and now the site is no longer available.
 
Many thanks if anyone can help.
